channel.title: Assassin cape?
channel.description: Made a new cape for my new skill. Turns half on my invisible...But I can see the cape. What's wrong?

item.title: Assassin cape?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Fixed it…Used a different cape base. Trimmed and untrimmed work okay now, although the logos on the back need some work.

Making other customs for the skill as well. Such as katars, katanas, etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin cape?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Maybe the ints?

If you cant see the cape in you’re model editing. If you’re using Metaseq it might be because you changed it into Invisible Mode. You can change this by the object Mode where the small eye is, if its not there then its invisible if it is then its visible.

Hope this helped.

EDIT: You’re new skill sounds fun. Even if it just says Assassin.
:eek: you should release it.

Read full topic
